website_summaries.verdict: This high-quality 20-piece air compressor accessory kit includes a wide range of tools and fittings that can help a homeowner accomplish a variety of tasks.
pros: The fittings are manufactured using hardened steel, and they are plated to resist corrosion
A tire inflator with a built-in gauge, blow gun, five cleaning and inflating nozzles, Teflon tape, and a 25-foot hybrid air hose are also included in this comprehensive kit
cons: Some users have difficulty getting the air chuck to stay attached when clipped to the tire

customer_reviews.title: Basic Math time
customer_reviews.text: The hose is great the fittings are fittings but the tire inflation gun is absolute trash. Took it out the package and looked at it and the thing is zero'ed out at 19 psi. Now I'm more than capable of just using it as is to do the job needed, but seriously if this made it past not only a machine but a person with eyes (I mean hell a person with 1 eye)could have seen this was faulty. Thankfully I have an air chuck already that this tire inflation gun is just for show anyways. Don't order this for the tire inflation device, the hose though worth it. But BOOOOOOOOO just BOOOOOOOOO.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product so, I have only used it a few times but so far it is fantastic. The order was delivered on time and in good condition. It is easy to setup and use. I would buy this again. I did receive an email offering me a $3.00 gift card in exchange for a review. I would have reviewed this product eventually anyway. The review was in no other way influenced by the offer of a gift card
customer_reviews.author: Grateful Zugore

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought this for me last December, but I just noticed that the tire gauge section of the inflator was off by 10 psi. The product has a 1 year warrantee, and once I emailed the manufacture at sales@yotootools.com they immediately found my order and sent me a replacement within a couple days. I am very satisfied! Appreciate their “no-hassle” support.
customer_reviews.author: Shearer

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I received the item as described and noticed the pistol tire gauge, when not under pressure, was reading 10psi (instead of 0psi). I emailed the manufacturer and they quickly sent a replacement. Very pleased with everything that came with this kit and the resolution by the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent kit for the value
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this was an excellent kit for the price. My only beef is with the Teflon tape provided, as it shredded easily and was not the quality expected, especially when prepping the fittings. Definite purchase here; just one minor issue.
customer_reviews.author: William Schwab Jr

customer_reviews.title: junk
customer_reviews.text: This set is not to bad but the guage for filling tires mine starts at 21 pounds so it's junk not worth the money. The hose always stays curled up won't lay out flat so always tripping over it. Just stay away
customer_reviews.author: Glen swiggum

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Not bad , the quick connect connector look cheap and are cheap , they leak a little bit, but the tire gauge and the blow gun are good "so far "
customer_reviews.author: agron sadiku

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy. 👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽
customer_reviews.text: I bought this but have not used it till today. My window of return has closed. POS. do not buy this product. Does not work. Reads my tire has 45psi When they have 30. Cheap junk.
customer_reviews.author: tinman

customer_reviews.title: Low Quality Air Compressor Accessories
customer_reviews.text: The brass hose end twisted off with little effort while connecting quick disconnect. Received vis USPS but had to return at a drop off UPS office. So inconvenient and quality is very poor. Dont buy this garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Other places sell just the hose for what this kit costs. No long term tests for durability but the overall fit and finish is okay for the occasional use I'll give it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you get the right adapters for your hose to fit your air tools
customer_reviews.text: The hose looks really great ain't had a chance to use it compare that to my Goodyear hose that I have same quality as it is I'm not tied to tire pressure gauge yet
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Siedl

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This hose feels like quality and works as intended. The accessories are also high quality and love that it came with an organizer to keep everything together.
customer_reviews.author: ejmille2

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent air hose and I have used many, many different types of hoses during my 40 year career. Love this hose! Soft, yet sturdy and durable. Nice.
customer_reviews.author: David Piscitello

customer_reviews.title: High quality compression Hose
customer_reviews.text: High quality hose that I would buy again if you need a quality air compressor hose ...this is it
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Flexible, affordable, quality and happy with it!
customer_reviews.text: Great products and I like the hybrid hose for its flexibility and light weight. Great price too
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M

customer_reviews.title: Tire Pressure Gauge doesn’t work!
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed at first. The hose and fittings are pretty nice, BUT I went to use the included tire pressure gauge and it was not working, just leaked air at the fitting. So I used the included plumber tape and it doesn’t leak air and it doesn’t air anything up.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Worst investment hose fitting came out as soon as I attached it to my compressor
customer_reviews.author: Sashii

customer_reviews.title: My review.
customer_reviews.text: It works but the air gauge is cheap. Mine was reading 5 psi right out of the box. Tried buying a newer better quality version and it too was reading 2 psi out of the box. If anyone has a link to a better quality air gauge Id appreciate a link.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Good hose but bad attachments
customer_reviews.text: Great hose but the tire chuck attachment didn’t last long. Used it twice before it stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Blow

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: Very well-made all attachments are nice and solid works great for small projects and very good for medium projects
customer_reviews.author: wes melton

customer_reviews.title: Air compressor Attachments
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as a present for his birthday he absolutely loves it. Works perfectly for his air compressor an it was fairly cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Rylee Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: plenty of accessories for the price But the air gauge pressure does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Eric C

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointing
customer_reviews.text: Seller used USPS, which caused shipping delays. First use out of the box, the tire inflation gauge does not work correctly - reads about 20 psi higher than reality. And, the valve stem connector does not make a good seal. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DSJ

customer_reviews.title: work's great
customer_reviews.text: I received the items pretty fast, and as soon as I got them I put them to work, I very happy w/them
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M. Munoz

customer_reviews.title: GOOD BUY FOR THE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Great product does the job and and excessories help out great.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: Air compressor hose kit
customer_reviews.text: I think it's a very good hose and kit for my compressor good value
customer_reviews.author: al brown

customer_reviews.title: This is a great accessory kit!
customer_reviews.text: This kit contains everything I need to use with my compressor! It was a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: laureen tonner

customer_reviews.title: Cheap kit
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. The hose seems durable and it handles 90psi with no issues. The air nozzle and tire fill nozzle both works great. No leaks. Fittings was a good fit and I did not see any issues there. Something I needed quick and cheap and it actually is a pretty good kit so far.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Good kit for household use
customer_reviews.text: I was given a small air compressor and needed to get accessories for it. This kit fit the bill nicely for what I wanted. I rated it 4 stars because the fitting for tire inflation is a little awkward to use. I ended up ordering a separate ball chuck to make it easier to use for tire inflation but overall it’s a decent general purpose kit.
customer_reviews.author: A. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used the tire inflation tool yet. But everything seems to be of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: YOTOO Heavy Duty Air Compressor Accessory Kit 20-Piece, 1/4" NPT Air Tool Kit with 100 PSI Tire Inflator Gauge, 3/8" x25' Hybrid Air Hose, Blow Gun and Air Hose Fittings
feature_bullets: GREAT AIR COMPRESSOR ACCESSORY KIT with all you need to start your projects. ONE YEAR WARRANTY. If any problems, Please feel free to contact us at any time.

TIRE INFLATOR WITH GAUGE FOR INFLATING CAR TIRES: Air inflation gun, air chuck, and tire gauge are all combined in one easy to use unit; Rugged die cast aluminum construction with chrome plate finish that is corrosion-resistant. Includes a presta valve adapter for connecting air chuck of this tire inflator to inflate presta valve tires

3/8"X25' HYBRID AIR HOSE FOR CONNECT AIR COMPRESSOR AND AIR TOOLS: Rubber and PVC blended material make this air hose durable and reliable. 3/8 inch inner diameter by 25 foot length provides flexibility and freedom of movement while tackling projects. Solid brass end fittings for long time use and bend restrictors reduce kinking and help to increase the life of the hose. Max working pressure:300 PSI. Bursting Pressure: 1200 PSI

6-PIECE STANDARD BLOW GUN AND NOZZLES FOR CLEANING JOBS AND INFLATING POOLS AND SPORT BALLS: Standard Blow gun with (3) inflation nozzles and (2) inflation needles for pool toys, sports balls and air mattresses

11-PIECE HEAVY DUTY 1/4" INDUSTRIAL STEEL AIR HOSE FITTINGS: Quick Couplers and plugs are made of hardened steel plated to resist rust and long time use. Recommended use with thread seal tape(Included)

specifications.Manufacturer: Hangzhou Yotoo Import and Export Co.,Ltd
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars114 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
